title: France: Pfizer and Ministers Sued by Vaccine Victims
cleaned_text:
Me Jean-Pierre Joseph is taking on Pfizer in Paris, as well as the ministers responsible for the vaccination campaign, in particular Olivier Véran and Jean Castex. See the video below. At the same time, a first hearing at the Marseille civil court took place on Monday January 9, following the action of lawyer Eric Lanzarone, defending nearly 300 clients who contracted illnesses shortly after their vaccination against Covid-19.



Me Jean-Pierre Joseph’s criminal complaint was filed with the Paris Court of Justice, Pôle Santé. The civil party is represented in particular by Marc Doyer, spokesperson for the association of victims of Covid vaccines Verity France: His wife Mauricette (ER: a French singer) died on June 23, 2021 of Creutzfeldt-Jakob disease following a Pfizer injection.

The lawyer is going after Pfizer, as well as former Prime Minister Jean Castex and the Minister of Health at the time Olivier Véran (who had claimed that the Covid vaccination had no connection with the Jakob-Creutzfeldt disease), as well as all the ministers and elected officials who had a responsibility in the vaccination campaign.

Marc Doyer calls on all victims or families of victims of this terrible disease, as well as other effects of Covid vaccines, to join this action, the legal costs being covered. Already 20 families are ready to join in.

As for the hearing held in Marseille, it will be a legal marathon for Marseille lawyer Eric Lanzarone and his client, a 55-year-old woman who prefers to remain anonymous.

The lawyer will try to have the rheumatoid arthritis developed by his client recognized, “a few days after her second dose of the Pfizer vaccine (…) Today, she cannot walk more than 300 to 400 meters and has since been on sick leave. It is a totally disabling side effect, ”he told the newspaper 20 minutes.

The hearing aims for the appointment of a medical expert to establish the causal link between the vaccinations and the development of this inflammatory joint disease.

Facing him, Capucine Van Robays represents the eight lawyers of Pfizer France, a branch of the American pharma company which manufactures the most injected “anti-Covid” vaccine in France. Me Lanzarone also subpoenaed the German company BioNTech, the laboratory which developed the vaccine.

The lawyer had already obtained, in October 2022 in Paris, the appointment of a medical expert in an identical case. “In Marseille, I also subpoenaed BioNTech, because during the hearing in Paris, Pfizer had discharged itself on this laboratory”, he explains. (ER: We’re not sure what this machine translated phrase means. Had Pfizer severed connections somehow with BioNTech, a German company?)

Eric Lanzarone says he has 300 similar files. “I often find identical pathologies: visual impairment, endometriosis, a lot of myocarditis”.

The lawyer who claims “not to be antivax” (ER: Why does this point have to be made?) had previously attacked the clause of the contract between Pfizer and the European Commission which provides that in the event of adverse effects, compensation is borne by the States. “It amounts to privatizing the profits and socializing the risks. I consider that it is not up to French taxpayers to pay for the undesirable effects, ”he accuses.

For this, it will already be necessary that the possibly designated expert concludes well on the link between vaccination and development of diseases. Then, a new section will open on the amount of compensation.

Nearly 140 million injections in France, all doses combined, according to data from Public Health France and compiled by CovidTracker. Contacted, Capucine Van Robays, lawyer for Pfizer, could not be contacted within the time allowed for the publication of the 20-minute article.

opengraph.title: France: Pfizer and Ministers Sued by Vaccine Victims - Europe Reloaded
opengraph.description: France: Pfizer and ministers sued by vaccine victims In Marseille and Paris, two actions have started on behalf of the alleged victims of Covid injections. They call on all concerned to join them. COVIDHUB.CH Me Jean-Pierre [...]
